availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Arnold. Father of Peter O. Arnold, James Arnold, Nancy Arnold, L. J. Arnold, Willis Arnold, A. Arnold, Fannie Arnold, Perry Arnold, Robert Arnold, and Margaret Arnold. Farmer in Trimble County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 1, p. 496B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Subdivision 2, p. 8.
Find A Grave, "Calvin W. Arnold (May 22, 1809-July 22, 1893)," Memorial #23018259, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/23018259 (accessed August 3, 2018).
